Package main

Class GameManager

java.lang.Object
main.GameManager
public class GameManager extends Object
The GameManager class allows for easy control of the GUI
i.e The launching and closing of various screens
Version:
1.1, May 2023.
Author:
Lachlan Stewart and Stephen Hockey
